pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Nonparametric Spectral Density Estimation Using B-Spline Priors // Implementation of a Metropolis-within-Gibbs MCMC algorithm to flexibly estimate the spectral density of a stationary time series. The algorithm updates a nonparametric B-spline prior using the Whittle likelihood to produce pseudo- posterior samples and is based on the work presented by Edwards, Meyer, and Christensen (2017) arXiv:1707.04878.
